Text.val: 1=Cust, 2=Vat, 3=Total, 4 = Base for Totals, 9 = Both total & base

ExpSyntax.val: IF({0,2}<>0 AND ({0,1}='L' OR {0,1}='LC') AND {0,40}<>0,{0,40}, IF({0,2}<>0 AND {0,1}<>'L' AND {0,1}<>'LC' AND {0,27}<>0,{0,27}, IF({0,46}<>0,{0,46}, IF({0,50}<>'' AND tab_ok('CTRYEU',EX), IF(ER='B',IF(ES<>'',5,0), 0), IF(EX<>'' AND EX<>'BE',0, IF(ER='B' AND ES<>'', IF(FA AND FB<>0 AND FW,7,0), IF((ER='P' OR ER='B' AND ES='') AND FA AND FB<>0 AND FW AND (EY OR EZ<>0 AND Year(Date()) >= EZ+10),8,0 )))))))
